title: Aaron Rodgers, Ben Roethlisberger, MVP, and Baker Mayfield
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Ben Roethlisberger, MVP, and Baker Mayfield
description:
Colin discusses why Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers deserves some of the blame, why Pittsburgh Steelers QB Ben Roethlisberger deserves more credit, who should win NFL MVP this season, and why Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield was out of line. Guests include Shannon Sharpe, Peter King, Trent Dilfer, and Rod Woodson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
